code: public void setConfig(Resource config) {     this.config = config. }

code: /**  * Resolve the config location if set.  * @return the location or {@code null} if it is not set  * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the config attribute is set to an unknown  * location  */ public Resource resolveConfigLocation() {     if (this.config == null) {         return null.     }     Assert.isTrue(this.config.exists(), () -> "Hazelcast configuration does not " + "exist '" + this.config.getDescription() + "'").     return this.config. }
